lead_paragraph: The original Mack Daddy is back and he’s still takin’ no guff from no suckahs! This pumping action/thriller sports a platinum-selling soundtrack and features many hit rap stars, including Ice-T, plus the cool soul sounds of Curtis Mayfield.
